p: Sequencing for previously described F- and M-IAV isolated during the 2009â€“2010 [ 5] influenza season was performed with the Illumina Genome Analyzer IIx using Illumina v5 sequencing chemistry and 36 bp single reads. Base calling was performed using Illumina pipeline version 1.7.0 (within SCS 2.8). All other viruses were sequenced with TruSeq v3 chemistry and 50 bp single reads on an Illumina HiSeq 2000. Total reads in each sample are indicated in S1 Table.
